channel.title: Java - Main Class
channel.description: Hello guys, This might be a stupid question but iv'e just started programming JAVA but i haven't tried out yet: When you start a new class or add something like you got a ''double'' and want to add a ''int'' do you add a new class you know the ''public static void main(String args[]){'' thing or do you just go on writing without adding a new one. -- Thankzorss - Valintina

item.title: Java - Main Class

item.description:

Hello guys,
This might be a stupid question but iv’e just started programming JAVA but i haven’t tried out yet:
When you start a new class or add something like you got a ‘‘double’’ and want to add a ‘‘int’’ do you add a new class you know the ‘‘public static void main(String args[]){’’ thing or do you just go on writing without adding a new one. – Thankzorss - Valintina
